synopsis.text: Together with the old man and his three singing cats, a young man discovers an unexpected source of joy during the holiday season. While wandering down an alleyway, he comes across a drunken cat that belongs to the old man. Intrigued, he visits a restaurant and learns that the old man has trained his three cats to sing. Impressed by their unique talent, the young man uncovers the secret behind their melodious voices. For a brief moment, they become the talk of the town, spreading cheer and delight wherever they go.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
